title: Teen manages portions of household budget with real responsibility
description: Teen manages portions of household budget with real responsibility
content:
Scenario: Teen manages portions of household budget with real responsibility
    Given Jasmine has been allocated responsibility for weekly food budget
    And the family has allocated $100/week for her to manage
    And this is part of the actual household budget, not pretend
    When Jasmine makes purchasing decisions
    Then she should have genuine authority over those funds
    And her decisions should have real impact on family wellbeing
    And the family_elohim should track her budget management
    And provide feedback on value optimization
    And recognize successful management: "Jasmine has stayed within budget and met family needs for 12 consecutive weeks"
    And support her learning household economics through real practice
